SELECT DC_CODE, D_NO, DC_NAME, D_NAME, DC_LOCATION, DC_NUMBER, D_IMGNAME, D_PRICE, D_CONTENT, DC_CONTENT, D_DISCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DC_CODE, D_NO, DC_NAME, D_NAME, DC_LOCATION, DC_NUMBER, D_IMGNAME, D_PRICE, D_CONTENT, DC_CONTENT, D_DISCOUNT FROM (SELECT A.DC_CODE AS DC_CODE, NVL(A.D_NO, '') AS D_NO, NVL(B.DC_NAME, '') AS DC_NAME, NVL(A.D_NAME, '') AS D_NAME, NVL(B.DC_LOCATION, '') AS DC_LOCATION, NVL(B.DC_NUMBER, '') AS DC_NUMBER, NVL(A.D_IMGNAME, '') AS D_IMGNAME, NVL(A.D_PRICE, 0) AS D_PRICE, NVL(B.DC_CONTENT, '') AS DC_CONTENT, NVL(A.D_CONTENT, '') AS D_CONTENT, NVL(A.D_DISCOUNT, 0) AS D_DISCOUNT FROM WD_DRESS A, WD_DRESS_COM B WHERE A.DC_CODE = B.DC_CODE
AND B.DC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND B.DC_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY A.D_NAME DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.D_NO) CNT FROM WD_DRESS A, WD_DRESS_COM B WHERE A.DC_CODE = B.DC_CODE
AND B.DC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND B.DC_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT A.DC_CODE AS DC_CODE, A.D_NO AS D_NO, NVL(B.DC_NAME, '') AS DC_NAME, NVL(B.DC_CONTENT, '') AS DC_CONTENT, NVL(B.DC_NUMBER, '') AS DC_NUMBER, NVL(B.DC_LOCATION, '') AS DC_LOCATION, NVL(A.D_NAME, '') AS D_NAME, NVL(A.D_IMGNAME, '') AS D_IMGNAME, NVL(A.D_PRICE, 0) AS D_PRICE, NVL(A.D_CONTENT, '') AS D_CONTENT, NVL(A.D_DISCOUNT, 0) AS D_DISCOUNT FROM WD_DRESS A, WD_DRESS_COM B WHERE A.D_NO = #{value} AND A.DC_CODE = B.DC_CODE

SELECT DC_CODE, D_NO, D_NAME, DC_NAME, D_IMGNAME, D_PRICE, D_CONTENT, D_DISCOUNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DC_CODE, D_NO, D_NAME, DC_NAME, D_IMGNAME, D_PRICE, D_CONTENT, D_DISCOUNT FROM( SELECT A.DC_CODE, A.D_NO, NVL(A.D_NAME, '') AS D_NAME, NVL(B.DC_NAME, '') AS DC_NAME, NVL(A.D_IMGNAME, '') AS D_IMGNAME, NVL(A.D_PRICE, 0) AS D_PRICE, NVL(A.D_CONTENT, '') AS D_CONTENT, NVL(A.D_DISCOUNT, 5) AS D_DISCOUNT FROM WD_DRESS A, WD_DRESS_COM B WHERE A.DC_CODE = #{dcCode} AND A.DC_CODE = B.DC_CODE AND A.D_NO NOT IN(#{dNo}))) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 4
